overview_summary: All five profiled neighbors have no clearly documented stance on the proposed development, so their positions remain unknown. None of them appear to hold significant influence in Deerpark’s civic or political life, as they are not public officials or prominent community figures.

neighbors.name: Anthony D. Risi
neighbors.claims: Anthony D. Risi is the listed owner of a parcel in Deerpark, but no public information on his background or local involvement could be found ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)). No meeting minutes or news reports mention Risi taking any stance on development proposals ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Approach with a neighborly, one-on-one conversation to learn any concerns he might have, since his views are not publicly known.

neighbors.name: Edward W. Henderson Jr.
neighbors.claims: Edward W. Henderson Jr. lives in the Sparrowbush area of Deerpark and his family operated a local drywall contracting business for decades ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/njherald/name/edward-henderson-obituary?id=9750677#:~:text=was%20the%20owner%20of%20Ed,his%20wife%2C%20Chandrena%2C%20of%20Franklin)). There is no record of Henderson speaking at town meetings or expressing views on development in any public forum ([www.legacy.com](https://www.legacy.com/us/obituaries/njherald/name/edward-henderson-obituary?id=9750677#:~:text=He%20is%20survived%20by%20his,by%20one%20grandchild%2C%20Matthew%20E)) ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)).
neighbors.influence_justification: Family tradesman; not in public office

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a personal discussion emphasizing project construction details and local economic benefits, aligning with his practical background as a tradesman.

neighbors.name: Darin Strauss
neighbors.claims: Darin Strauss is identified as an owner of parcel 13-1-10 in Deerpark, but no additional personal or civic details are available in public records ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)). Strauss has not been noted in any local meetings or media regarding development issues ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Engage with open questions and provide clear information about the project, as his perspective isn’t publicly known and he has no evident community role.

neighbors.name: Paul F. Farinella
neighbors.claims: Paul F. Farinella owns Deerpark parcel 13-1-20, but there is no public profile or local leadership role associated with his name ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)). No evidence was found of Farinella participating in town meetings or taking a public stance on development ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Use a friendly, informational approach to reach out and understand any questions or concerns, since he has maintained a low public profile.

neighbors.name: Edner Carl Narcisse
neighbors.claims: Edner Carl Narcisse is a property owner whose primary work and residence are outside Deerpark (in Spring Valley, NY) ([www.signalhire.com](https://www.signalhire.com/profiles/edner-carl-narcisse%27s-email/205089889#:~:text=Location%3A)). He has no known involvement in Deerpark civic affairs or any stated position on local development matters ([townofdeerparkny.gov](https://townofdeerparkny.gov/?page_id=186#:~:text=Minutes)).

approach_recommendations.engage: Provide updates and point-of-contact information via mail or email, as he resides out of town and may not be actively following local discussions.
